48 double randMToN(double M, double N)
49 {
50  return M + (rand() / ( RAND_MAX / (N-M) ) ) ;
51 }
52 
53 
54 
55 /********************************************/
65 bool myrandom (rt2_assignment_2::RandomPosition::Request &req, rt2_assignment_2::RandomPosition::Response &res)
66 {
67  res.x = randMToN(req.x_min, req.x_max);
68  res.y = randMToN(req.y_min, req.y_max);
69  res.theta = randMToN(-M_PI, M_PI);
70 
71  return true;
72 }
73

84 int main(int argc, char **argv)
85 {
86  ros::init(argc, argv, "random_position_server");
87  ros::NodeHandle n;
88 
89  ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("/position_server", myrandom);
90 
91  ros::spin();
92 
93  return 0;
94 }
